snippet.title: Antrabhara 中阴 | Puzzle Solving RPG Demo Gameplay 1 | No Commentary
snippet.description:
Title: Antrabhara 中阴
Developer: Nekoday
Publisher: Nekoday

在人类与妖怪共存的世界中，三个身份迥异的少年少女在荒废古宅中相遇。结伴冒险的过程中收集道具、推敲讯息、解开谜题，逃离不可名状的生物，并揭开古宅家族背后的血色历史，最终发现“中阴”的秘密。
In a world where humankind and yokai co-exist, three fateful characters meet in an abandoned mansion. Collect items, clues and uncover the bloody history of the mansion, while staying alive. 

Steam Storepage: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2162900/Antrabhara/
